description: Stay dry, warm, and happy out there in these weather-ready pants crafted with on-the-go utility.  Soft, fleece-like lining keeps warmth close, water-repellent tech stands up against light rain, and UPF 50 sun protection keep the sun at bay.  The high-rise waist is slightly higher in back to stay in place when bending and lunging. Plenty of pockets and cinchable cuffs let you adapt as needed. Omni-Shade™ UPF 50 sun protection
name: Back Beauty Warm Softshell Pants, Reg - Womens
